Punabbasu，【陽】 井宿（二十七星宿之一）。（p229）
Punabbasu，【陽】井宿（二十七星宿之一）。

Punabbasu：1．Punabbasu．A young Yakkha （S．i．210）．He became a sotāpanna （SA．i．239）．See Punabbasumātā．

2．Punabbasu． One of the Chabbaggiyā．His followers were called Panabbasukā，and，together with the followers ofAssaji，they were calledAssaji Punabbasukā．

Punabbasu Sutta．Records an incident relating toPunabbasumātā．S．i．210．

punabbasu：ပုနဗ္ဗသု （ပ）
ပုနဗ္ဗသုနက္ခတ်။
